Title: Abandoned Castle
Credits: Created by Akira Shemansky for CMPM 120 using code by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu).

Main Hall.Body: You're standing in the main hall of an old, abandoned castle. Sunlight is streaming in through holes in the ceiling. There is a staircase to your north, doorways to the east and west, and a large double-door to the south.

Staircase.Body: You walk towards the stairs. Fallen pieces of the ceiling and the surrounding collumns have rendred them unusable.

East Room.Body: You walk into the room to the east. It's too dark to see anything.

West Room.Body: You walk into the room to the west. Water is pouring in from an adjacent room, creating a pool across the vast, sunken floor. It wouldn't be wise to continue this way.

Exit.Body: You push open the large door. A crack of light down the middle grows larger and larger as you push the two sides apart. Eventually, you're able to go out between them, and you enter a lush green forest, stretching out as far as you can see.
